document_data.name: Angel of vengeance
document_data.mainbody: An '''angel of vengeance''' was an [[Angel (astral)|angel]] sent to punish those who defied or angered the gods, or to test a mortal who was in danger of falling from the path a deity set for them.
document_data.Combat: When in battle, these [[immortal]]s wore [[plate mail]] and fought with dual [[longsword]]s.
document_data.Society: Influential clergy members were known to use a powerful ritual to call forth one of these angels to deal out their deity's wrath.
document_data.Notable Angels of Vengeance: * [[Zaol]], an outcast who colonized the castle of [[Iyraclea]] sometime after she had abandoned it in [[1373 DR]].<ref>
